page.title: 20Organisations in Haughton.
page.content: Haughton is just the right size to have many successful organisations.There are 16 organisations in the village. ost meet in the village hall.The children and young people have several groups which they can join.The Playgroup is held on three mornings a week.The Junior and Senior Youth Club and the Scouts have weekly meetings.The White Heather Club,for the over 60's meets fortnightly and the Afternoon W.I Evening W.I.and a very popular Produce Guild,with 50-60 members,meet monthly. The Parent Teacher Association holds its meetings at the school.The Brownies and Guides also meet there each week.A Keep Fit class is run by the Education Authority.The Sunday School meets in the school each Sunday.Those children who have been confirmed can join the Crusaders,the Doves or the Icthus Club depending on their age.
